posts.post_content:
Hello Net54ers,

Thanks for reading my post. I'm in the process of trying to put together a mid grade subject back run of Ed Walsh. If you're interested in selling one you'd be willing to part with please let me know.

Also of particular interest to me is a Walsh with that elusive Old Mill or Sweet Caporal Factory 25 back. A long shot, I know!

Thanks!
Eric
Erick, best of luck with your back run, but remember, it won't be complete without a Blue Old Mill.   :)

Sean,

Thanks, you're right! $14,000 through HA in 2013 -- Holy cow!
